actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to exclude interest and dividends from gross income earned by individuals.

summary.text: Amends the Internal Revenue Code to exclude from gross income all interest and dividend income received during the taxable year by an individual. Repeals provisions of the Economic Recovery Tax Act of 1981 which provide an increased exclusion of interest income in 1985.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to exclude interest and dividends from gross income earned by individuals.
